birthdate.description: Your date of birth may be used for account security and personalisation.

errors.bad_year: Please enter your full year of birth
errors.future: Please enter a date in the past
errors.invalid: The date of birth is invalid

birthdate.title: Set your date of birth
birthdate.updateSuccess: Your date of birth has been saved

gender.description: Your gender is used for personalisation and to address you correctly.
gender.example: Alex sent an update. Check {gender, select, female {her} male {his} other {the}} message for details.
gender.title: Set your gender
gender.updateSuccess: Your gender details have been saved

home.profileDescription: Check your profile and update your information
home.securityDescription: Manage your privacy settings and account security
home.title: Welcome <bold>{name}</bold>

name.description: Your name will be visible to other users you interact with on <noo></noo>. If you use <noo></noo> to sign in to other apps, your name can also be shared with them, if you choose.

errors.invalid: The name contains some invalid characters
errors.tooLong: The name you entered is too long
errors.tooShort: The name you entered is too short

name.title: Change your name
name.updateNotice: This update applies to all <noo></noo> services. You may still need to update your name separately for other apps.

camera.description: Use your device's camera to take a photo.
camera.title: Take a photo

picture_dialog.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

main.description: A photo helps you and others recognize your account. You can change or remove it at any time.
main.title: Profile photo

picture_dialog.remove_success: Your profile photo has been removed

error.mime: The photo is not supported. Please choose a JPG, PNG, or GIF file.
error.size: The photo is too large. Please choose a photo that is less than 10MB.

upload.success: Your profile photo has been updated.
upload.title: Choose a photo
